sections.heading: 01|Definitions - UCC 2-103 to 2-106
sections.text: Effective:June 29, 2011Latest Legislation:House Bill 9 - 129th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) As used in sections1302.01to1302.98of the Revised Code, unless the context otherwise requires:(1) "Buyer" means a person who buys or contracts to buy
